Tuesday, August 22, 2023

Rails Versions 7.0.7.1, 6.1.7.5 have been released!

Posted by tenderlove

Hi everyone! Rails versions 7.0.7.1 and 6.1.7.5 have been released! These are security releases, so please upgrade when you get a chance! You can check out the CVE details here. The releases only contain the security fix, so hopefully upgrading will be easy.

Thanks, and have a great day!

❤️

Here are the shasums for this release!

$ shasum *6.1.7.5*
